component_text.text: The Wu Xing Compass harnesses the Winds of Magic to bring prosperity to Grand Cathay.\nDirecting the compass fills the respective energy reserve; the greater the energy reserve, the larger the benefits are. However, the energy reserve of all directions will decay over time.

turns_counter.componentleveltooltip: Turns until compass direction can be changed

component_text.text: Select a compass direction to apply its effects
Strength determined by energy reserve (always active):
Strength determined by energy reserve (always active):

panel_smoke_t.comment: Opacity set to 0 so that when material cant be shown (loading screens) it doesnt leave a blank white image around!
